title: New: Mood Indigo – Dive
content:
For quite a while now it’s been glaringly evident that whilst the ‘bedroom producer’ scene is thriving, with the likes of Mmoths, Beat Culture and XXYYXX gaining critical success all around the world, we’re still waiting for one of them to take it to the next level, and change the game forever, in the way that The Avalanches did in 2000.

While I’m not saying that Boston’s Mood Indigo will definitely be the one to do it, it’s certainly a step in the right direction, blending the (dare I say it) chillwave influences with the more trip-hop vibe of Flying Lotus, creating something that’s brilliantly disjointed and engaging. Check out Dive below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
